    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83355</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Protecting the skin using sunscreen cream</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Hautverwenden schützend, sunscreen Creme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protection de la peau en utilisant la crème de 
protection solaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Protegendo usar-se da pele sunscreen o creme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proteggendo usando della pelle sunscreen la 
crema</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προστασία του δέρματος που χρησιμοποιεί sunscreen 
την κρέμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Protegiendo usar de la piel sunscreen la crema</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how sunscreen cream can help protect the skin from skin cancer by absorbing the ultraviolet rays.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">skin cancer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunscreen cream</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ultraviolet rays</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie Creme kann helfen die,
Haut vor Hautkrebs zu schützen sunscreen, indem Sie die 
ultravioletten Strahlen aufsaugen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment la crème de 
protection solaire peut aider à protéger la peau contre le cancer de peau en
absorbant les rayons ultra-violets.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como sunscreen o creme 
pode ajudar proteger a pele do cancer da pele absorvendo os raios 
ultravioletas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come sunscreen la 
crema può contribuire a proteggere la pelle dal cancro della pelle 
assorbendo i raggi ultravioletti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς sunscreen η 
κρέμα μπορεί να βοηθήσει προστατεύω το δέρμα από τον καρκίνο 
δερμάτων με να απορροφήσει τις υπεριώδεις ακτίνες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo sunscreen la 
crema puede ayudar a proteger la piel contra cáncer de la piel 
absorbiendo los rayos ultravioletas.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
